name: Russian Judge Redemption
description:
Try to redeem the Russian Judge by coming up with a similar score to the other judges!

Controls:

Left and Right arrow to adjust your score.

Brought to you by:

Becky, Brandon, Evan, and Peter

and the 2016 STL ScatterJam!
